title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: shinyMixR package developed graphical user interface around nlmixr nlmixr2 package. build shiny package combined bs4Dash. Many functions within package can also used outside interface within interactive R session. vignette give brief introduction package can used important functions . working package, two important assumptions: specific folder structure place. structure used package read write certain files (folder structure can generated automatically using create_proj function) Within folder structure, multiple models can present considered “project”. package creates manages project object available global environment

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: get started, first relevant packages need installed, e.g.: easiest way get know package start creating necessary folder structure: default, folder structure created within current directory, include example models. however also possible create project folder (e.g. create_proj(loc='/anypath')). following folders created: analysis: folder plots tables saved structured way make accessible interface data: data files used models R data format (.rds) models: models, available separate R scripts according unified user interface nlmixr scripts: generic analysis scripts made available interface shinyMixR: folder used interface store temporary files results files interface monitors happens folders. important know new models /data can copied folders files can removed. recognized within app (refreshing overview). way possible work data models separately plug shinyMixR later stage. folder structure present interface can started: interface started project object created global environment information kept/managed. correct, interface open default browser following seen:  left side, sidebar various menu items. content main body open model overview changes based selected menu item sidebar. sidebar can collapsed clicking three lines top bar, providing room main body.
code: # For development versions devtools::install_github("richardhooijmaijers/shinyMixR") # Or for CRAN release install.packages("shinyMixR") # It is advised to use the CRAN releas of nlmixr2 install.packages("nlmixr2") # It is advised to use xpose.nlmixr2 for easy diagnostics install.packages("xpose.nlmixr2") library(shinyMixR,quietly = TRUE) create_proj() run_shinymixr(launch.browser = TRUE)

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: overview page can used see models present project. overview can exported CSV file selection columns can made displayed (using DT package). Also tree overview models can created , show various models within project relate one another. Within view several main actions one can perform discussed following subsections.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: interface work folder structure holds project information. case new models added manually result files created model run, interface needs refreshed show latest information. can done clicking refresh button available overview.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: model file within project can hold meta data. meta data consist : data; name data set used model without extension. Data read data folder can either saved R data frame (rds) comma separate file (csv) desc; free description model easy tracking project ref; reference model current model emerge. used tree view general overview models relate imp; importance number. arbitrary number can provided mainly convenient filtering within overview est; estimation method used model. can method supported nlmixr2 package (see nlmixr2est::nlmixr2AllEst() supported methods). control; list control options selected estimation method. possible options may differ per estimation method (see instance saemControl foceiControl) subs; can valid string can processed subset function R. used create subset data passed model (e.g. comparable IGNORE statements NONMEM) Using “Adapt meta data” button within overview, can easily create change meta data model. meta data adapted model file can seen model opened editor.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: possible write scripts can used analyse model results. script can used process result one multiple models (interface include name selected models script). example scripts included package available scripts folder project created. possible create script taking one example scripts example.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: possible view combine results models within project using “Create report” button. results created using one scripts mentioned , results present default location. “Create report” functionality can combine results overall document easy sharing discussions.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: Although possible delete models manually within project folder, advised use functionality within interface. main reason delete everything associated model, like results, tables, figures, etc.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: edit tab can used edit existing models within editor including syntax coloring (using shinyAce package). also possible create new models using various templates duplicate existing models. Finally initial estimates model can updated using final estimates (another) model.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: run tab can used run models within project. possible run one multiple models . Also possible assess intermediate output progress nlmixr2 run. Furthermore, can see models still running background kill model submitted interface.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: parameter estimates tab can used generate table parameter estimates. case multiple models selected table show results run separate column. page reactive means case different model selected, table directly updated. possibilities save table latex/pdf html file, show back-transformed values include shrinkage subject variability within output

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: goodness fit tab can used generate relevant goodness fit plots. Plots can generate using nlmixr.xpose2 package directly using ggplot (can specified settings widget). Also plots can saved latex/pdf html file. Additional options present pre-process data, select type plot color observations variable data.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: fit plots tab can used generate individual fit plots. general similar options present goodness fit plots. Additionally variables plotting can selected enable different types plots.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: data exploration tab can used generate exploratory plots input results data. Different types plots possible including point, line, boxplot, barplot, histograms . Different layers can added plot simple summary stats can included. Finally data can presented plot, interactive plotly table.

title: Introduction to the shinyMixR package
text: working interactive R session, many functions used interface also available interactive R session. working outside interface important know interact project object. object created one first steps function rely availability object: function look folder structure create update available information. result list build-follows: case object present created looking files present current folder structure. case object already present check newer files present current folder update object information. Therefore one aware function submitted manually case new information present one folders. folder structure place project object created, overview can created available models , models submitted, high level results. also possible display collapsible d3 tree view models. mainly useful case reference models provided show hierarchy models within project: Although nlmixr2 package obviously possibility run nlmixr models, shinyMixR package also function available named run_nmx. main reason function written option run model external R session. necessary within interface overcome application freezing model submitted. Also within interactive R session convenient wait run finish. example can used given : current version package three functions assessing model results. first function create simple parameter table par_table. default function returns data.frame. case multiple models selected, column results selected model. results can also written PDF (using latex) html file using R3port package: assessing goodness fit, gof_plot function can used. function default use nlmixr.xpose2 package create 4 different types plots. also possible directly create ggplot2 types plots. default plots created within R session can also written pdf/html using R3port package:  last plot individual fit plot fit_plot. function also default use nlmixr.xpose2 package create plot per individual including observed data, individual population predictions. Also possible create ggplot2 types plots provide bit flexibility shown plots can outputted pdf/html:
code: proj_obj <- get_proj() object |--- run 1 |    |--- model location |    |--- model meta data |    |--- model high level results | |--- ... | |--- meta data (time of last refresh) overview() tree_overview() run_nmx("run1") # progress of a run is written to external text file # this can be read-in for intermediate assessment readLines("shinyMixR/temp/run1.prog.txt") # Default data frame par_table(proj_obj,c("run1","run2")) # output to tex file (compiled to pdf) par_table(proj_obj, models="run1", outnm="par.tex") res  <- readRDS("./shinyMixR/run1.res.rds") gof_plot(res, type="user") # gof_plot(res, mdlnm="run1", outnm="gof.tex") res$TRT <- ifelse(as.numeric(res$ID)<6,1,2) fit_plot(res, by="TRT", PRED="CPRED", type="user",logy=FALSE) # fit_plot(res, mdlnm="run1", outnm="fit.html")

title: Interactive shiny Dashboard for nlmixr2
text: shinyMixR package initially developed graphical interface nlmixr package provides full support nlmixr2. package include shiny (dashboard) interface helps managing, running, editing analysing nlmixr models. Although main focus build interface, many package functions also directly available usage interactive R session.

title: Create fit plot — fit_plot
text: dfrm data frame created nlmixr function type character defining type plot created. currently "xpose" "user" supported xpose ggplot style plots character vector variables facetting idv independent variable x variable obs variable observed data points pred variable predicted data points ipred variable individual predicted data points grp variable grouping (mainly draw separate lines) logy logical y-axis displayed log scale scales character length one defining scale parameter ggplot (e.g. "fixed", "free","free_y",etc) mdlnm character name model outnm character name output file (see details) projloc character base location shinyMixR project ... additional arguments passed ltx_plot html_plot

shinyMixR 0.5
text: version preview version package. main changes : Refactoring code remove global assignments implement use reactiveValues. Added codecoverage package. Added new testing structure package including shinytest2 automated testing app. Improved documentation prepare CRAN submission.

title: shinyMixR 0.4
text: Within version updates implemented, see important changes: Implemented shiny modules back-bone structure app Used bs4Dash package create dashboard instead shinydashboard parameter table provide options include BSV, shrinkage back-transformation gof plots added option subset perform pre-coding, adjust plot size option color variable fit plots added option subset perform pre-coding, adjust plot size options select variables adjust scaling Added data exploration widget create exploratory (interactive) plots show underlying data Moved scripting functionality widget button overview added options include arguments scripts Moved reporting functionality widget button overview

title: shinyMixR 0.3
text: Within version updates implemented, see important changes: Applied different style shinydashboard Corrected behaviour modals Support original nlmixr package (backwards compatibility) latest nlmixr2 package

title: shinyMixR 0.2
text: Within version major updates implemented, see important changes: Complete new structure app using template system ui/server widgets. implemented make easier maintain extend package Omit filebrowser functionality, lead confusion works slowly. Also properly browse root. now handled providing location run_shinymixr Switched shinyBS shiny modals (latest shiny version play well shinyBS!) Improved way adapting meta data overview widget Improved way getting meta data models (making startup app appr. 10 times faster) Automatic output redirecting app run model scripts Omitted duplicate model functionality practically save functionality
